Name: Guidelines for the monitoring and reporting of greenhouse gas emissions under the Emission Trading Scheme.
Measurement/Calculation Methodology already prescribed by the competent authority in a licence or an operating permit for that facility
National or regional binding measurement/calculation methodology prescribed by legal act for the pollutant and facility concerned.
Alternative measurement methodology in accordance with existing CEN/ISO measurement standards
Measurement methodology for the performance of which is demonstrated by means of certified reference materials and accepted by competent authority.
Mass balance method which is accepted by the competent authority
